<small>Aramaic form: [[H6568]]</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַשׁ‎</span>] **verb** ==make distinct, declare== (Late Hebrew ***seperate oneself***, **Pi\`el** ***separate, explain***, so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּרַשׁ‎</span> especially Pa\`el; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***separate, distinguish, explain***, compare Mandean, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 221</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְרשׁ לָהֶם עַלפִּֿי י‎</span> [[Lev.24.12|Lev 24:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***to declare distinctly to them***. **Niph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְרָשׁוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.34.12|Ezek 34:12]] read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוֺת‎</span>-, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרשׂ‎</span>. **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּרַשׁ‎</span> [[Num.15.34|Num 15:34]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) what should be done to him ***had*** not ***been distinctly declared; Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפֹרָשׁ‎</span> [[Neh.8.8|Neh 8:8]] ***made distinct*** (compare [[BDB#B|B]] Aram [[Ezra.4.18|Ezra 4:18]]), see [[BDB#Be|BeRy]] [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Einl. 99, &gt;</sup> ***interpreted***, [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] and others, [[BDB#T.Onk.|Berliner]]<sup>T. Onk ii.74</sup>. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַשׁ‎</span>] **verb Hiph\`il** ==pierce, sting== (?) (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***paruššu***</u></abbr>, ***staff*** (which pierces); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פרשׁא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (in Lexicons) ***ox-goad***); — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַפְרִשׁ‎</span> [[Prov.23.32|Prov 23:32]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּצִפְעֹנִי‎</span>, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּנָחָשׁ יִשָׁ֑ךְ‎</span>), of wine.
